### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(x=41.0 y=-82.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=41.0 y=-82.0) and a stone furnace at position(x=41.0 y=-80.0)
-  Burner inserter (position x=39.5 y=-79.5) 
-  Burner inserter (position x=41.5 y=-78.5)

### Copper plate mine at position(x=60.0 y=-60.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Stone furnace (position x=60.0 y=-60.0)

### Electricity generator at position(x=106.5 y=-32.5)
Consists of offshore pump (position x=106.5 y=-32.5), boiler (position x=111.5 y=-32.0) and steam engine (position x=117.5 y=-30.5)

### Transport system at position(x=40.5 y=-83.5)
Consists of belt group (position x=40.5 y=-83.5) and transport belts (positions x=63.5 y=-53.5 and x=64.5 y=-53.5)

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when entities are not fueled
-  Ensure that burner mining drills, stone furnaces, and boilers have a fuel source before operating.
### Errors when entities are not connected
-  Ensure that steam engines are connected to a power source before operating.
### Errors when entities are not plugged into electric network
-  Ensure that electricity groups are plugged into an electric network before operating.
### Errors when entities have no ingredients
-  Ensure that stone furnaces have the necessary ingredients before operating.
### Errors when entities have no source items
-  Ensure that burner inserters have a source of items before operating.

### NAMESPACE
No utility functions have been defined by the agent. 
Important variables that have been assigned include:
* Entity positions (e.g. x=41.0 y=-82.0)
* Entity statuses (e.g. EntityStatus.NO_FUEL)
* Entity types (e.g. burner-mining-drill, stone-furnace)
